attributes.action: End the war crimes of Joseph Kony
attributes.additional_details:
Joseph Kony has been committing grave crimes against humanity for the last 26 years. This needs to stop now!

His targeting of innocent children to wage his war is totally unacceptable and needs to be addressed immediately.

Therefore by supporting this petition, it will raise awareness and pressure politicians to put the issue of Kony on the agenda in Parliament.
